    • Constructor Detail

      • Decoder

        public Decoder(byte[] decoderSpecificInfo)
        throws AACException
        Initializes the decoder with a MP4 decoder specific info. After this the MP4 frames can be passed to the decodeFrame(byte[], SampleBuffer) method to decode them.
        Parameters:
        decoderSpecificInfo - a byte array containing the decoder specific info from an MP4 container
        Throws:
        AACException - if the specified profile is not supported

    • Method Detail

      • canDecode

        public static boolean canDecode(Profile profile)
        The methods returns true, if a profile is supported by the decoder.
        Parameters:
        profile - an AAC profile
        Returns:
        true if the specified profile can be decoded
        See Also:
        Profile.isDecodingSupported()

      • getConfig

        public DecoderConfig getConfig()

      • decodeFrame

        public void decodeFrame(byte[] frame,
               SampleBuffer buffer)
                 throws AACException
        Decodes one frame of AAC data in frame mode and returns the raw PCM data.
        Parameters:
        frame - the AAC frame
        buffer - a buffer to hold the decoded PCM data
        Throws:
        AACException - if decoding fails
